This is a test document for upload testing.

This document contains sample text content that can be used to test:
- File upload functionality
- Document encryption and decryption
- File integrity verification
- Content search capabilities
- OCR text extraction simulation

The document also includes some special characters: àáâãäåæçèéêë
And some numbers: 123456789
And some symbols: !@#$%^&*()_+-={}[]|;':",./<>?

This content should be preserved through the upload, encryption, and download process.
